channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI

item.title: Report X-2023120401
item.description:
Report X-2023120401

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: OSHKOSH
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA with a wet upper corner. 1 bottle inside showed signs of leaking,. Due to way package was wet inside and out, it had to have been loaded on the trailer either upside down or on it's side in defiance of orientation arrows. DescribePack: 1 bottle from the corner that was wet had slightly less volume than the other 3 bottles. Possible loose cap and improper loading in trailer. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a tote until it could be processed.

item.title: Report X-2023120753
item.description:
Report X-2023120753

  • City: ALTOONA

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGED ARIVED AT CENTER. INTERNATIONAL CLERK QUESTIONED BATTERY CONTENTS. RMP THEN CALLED HELP DESK. HELP DESK OPERATOR DETERMINED PACKAGE TO BE UNDECLARED HAZMAT. LITHIUM ION BATTERIES CONTAINED IN EQUIPMENT; (26) CELL PHONES

item.title: Report X-2023120187
item.description:
Report X-2023120187

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was dropped on its top and two of the caps feel off and the contents have leaked out. DescribePack: the caps are loose or have fallen off completely. the box has a crushed side and top. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: all was put into a hazmat tote
